includedAssets.title: Tin Man Is Down
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep1 - Tin Man Is Down
includedAssets.synopsis: The decimated CIA must mourn and face the consequences of the Langley attack. Third season of the action-packed political thriller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The decimated CIA must mourn and face the consequences of the Langley attack. Third season of the action-packed political thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The decimated CIA must mourn and face the consequences of the Langley attack. Third season of the action-packed political thriller.

includedAssets.title: Uh... Oh... Ah...
includedAssets.synopsis: Saul's testimony sends Carrie out of control, forcing Dar Adal to intervene. Chris struggles to hold the Brody family together.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Saul's testimony sends Carrie out of control, forcing Dar Adal to intervene. Chris struggles to hold the Brody family together.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saul's testimony sends Carrie out of control, forcing Dar Adal to intervene. Chris struggles to hold the Brody family together.

includedAssets.title: Tower Of David
includedAssets.synopsis: An injured Brody finds refuge, but gets some unconventional medical help. Carrie tries to get a message to Saul.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An injured Brody finds refuge, but gets some unconventional medical help. Carrie tries to get a message to Saul.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An injured Brody finds refuge, but gets some unconventional medical help. Carrie tries to get a message to Saul.

includedAssets.title: Game On
includedAssets.synopsis: After a law firm approaches Carrie, the truth about her hospitalisation is revealed. Dana takes her relationship a step further.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After a law firm approaches Carrie, the truth about her hospitalisation is revealed. Dana takes her relationship a step further.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After a law firm approaches Carrie, the truth about her hospitalisation is revealed. Dana takes her relationship a step further.

includedAssets.title: The Yoga Play
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie loses her surveillance to find Dana, who learns more about Leo's past. Saul discovers the identity of the new CIA Director.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carrie loses her surveillance to find Dana, who learns more about Leo's past. Saul discovers the identity of the new CIA Director.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie loses her surveillance to find Dana, who learns more about Leo's past. Saul discovers the identity of the new CIA Director.

includedAssets.title: Still Positive
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie continues with her mission, while Saul adapts to changes at the CIA and encounters an old ally.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Carrie continues with her mission, while Saul adapts to changes at the CIA and encounters an old ally.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie continues with her mission, while Saul adapts to changes at the CIA and encounters an old ally.

includedAssets.title: Gerontion
includedAssets.synopsis: Saul has Javadi where he wants him, but risks his career to complete the mission. Carrie gains ground in her attempt to clear Brody's name.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saul has Javadi where he wants him, but risks his career to complete the mission. Carrie gains ground in her attempt to clear Brody's name.

includedAssets.title: A Red Wheelbarrow
includedAssets.synopsis: The CIA close in on the real Langley bomber, but Carrie's feelings for Brody put the mission at risk.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The CIA close in on the real Langley bomber, but Carrie's feelings for Brody put the mission at risk.

includedAssets.title: One Last Thing
includedAssets.synopsis: Saul takes up a task that proves more difficult than he expected, forcing him to reveal all to Carrie and ask for her help.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saul takes up a task that proves more difficult than he expected, forcing him to reveal all to Carrie and ask for her help.

includedAssets.title: Big Man In Tehran
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep11 - Big Man In Tehran

includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brody begins his mission while Carrie attempts to secure him an escape route.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brody begins his mission while Carrie attempts to secure him an escape route.

includedAssets.title: The Star
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie and Brody go to a safe house while Saul orders their extraction. Final episode of season three.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Carrie and Brody go to a safe house while Saul orders their extraction. Final episode of season three.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Brody, Carrie and Saul try to cope in the aftermath of the attack, but there is still work to be done and questions to be answered. Third season of the thrilling U.S. drama starring Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Mandy Patinkin and Rupert Friend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brody, Carrie and Saul try to cope in the aftermath of the attack, but there is still work to be done. Claire Danes and Damian Lewis star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brody, Carrie and Saul try to cope in the aftermath of the attack, but there is still work to be done and questions to be answered. Third season of the thrilling U.S. drama starring Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Mandy Patinkin and Rupert Friend.

includedIn.title: Homeland
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Counter-terrorist expert Carrie Mathison struggles to balance her brilliance with the challenges of bipolar disorder as she fights to protect the US.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Counter-terrorist expert Carrie Mathison struggles to balance her instinctual brilliance with the challenges of bipolar disorder as she fights to protect the US from attack.
